There are different levels of documentation.

- Code: This includes things like function documentation and code comments, and also overall usage instructions.
- Project: Documentation at this level includes things like Problem Definitions, decision logs and QA log.
- Analysis: This refers to [outputs of the analysis][outputs], such as written reports or interactive apps.

[outputs]: https://nhsbsa-data-analytics.github.io/nhsbsa-quality-analysis-playbook/guidance/02-analytical-cycle/pages/06-delivery-and-approval.html
